snippet.title: MOTHERGUNSHIP - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Craft gun monstrosities that no reasonable person could ever lift in the official demo of the upcoming bullet hell first-person shooter, MOTHERGUNSHIP!

MOTHERGUNSHIP mixes bullet-hell intensity with the FPS genre and promises you one of the largest gun customization options seen in video games. Want to build a gun with fifteen barrels that will cover all sides of the screen? Or do you prefer a shotgun that can shoot bouncing spike balls? Go for it! The design of your destructive arsenal is in your hands.

The MOTHERGUNSHIP: Gun Crafting Range demo is now available for free on Steam, PS4 and Xbox One!

Download the demo on:
Steam: http://bit.ly/2kjO50q
Xbox One: http://bit.ly/2GKlH0c
PS4 UK: http://bit.ly/2IHMPid
PS4 US: http://bit.ly/2INTZBX

Wishlist the game on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/574090

Join the Resistance and get all the latest news and updates! 
Official website: http://www.mothergunship.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mothergunship
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mothergunship

Grip Digital website: http://www.grip-digital.com/
Grip Digital Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Grip-Digital...
Grip Digital Twitter: https://twitter.com/grip_digital
Joe Mirabello's Twitter: https://twitter.com/blankslatejoe
